computation_definitions: The indicator shows the existence of national strategic/regulatory framework on disaster risk reduction (DRR). It is recommended to consider the national strategy on disaster risk reduction aligned to the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction for 2015-2030 if the respective strategy meets the minimum requirements set in para. 27 letter (b) from the Sendai Framework. Qualitative indicator of "Yes/No" type.
